A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm no one to tell you what to favor or to make you think I'm a way\, but I just want to give my honest opinion out there to anyone who's open to looking at others thoughts in a topic. Star Wars the last Jedi lacks so much\, the action\, the length\, the story it really tries to hard to shuffle everything around. It's 2 and 38 minutes! It really felt like 5 hours but that's my opinion. I am extremely agree the humor is true it really gives your a laugh! Anyone who would like to go watch it\, love it hate it\, it's up to you. For me defiantly not the movie I was hoping for .
